titleStmt.title: A proclamation for calling out heretors &c. for His Majesties service
Proclamations. 1688-10-03
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edinburgh, the third day of October, 1688. And of our reign the fourth year.
Steele notation: Arms 235; King Command will.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
